name: Ram (AZRK)
description:
RUN AS FAR AS YOU CAN!
Ram is a pixelated endless runner with quests, achievements, shop and customizations!

★ Run, jump and slide in a fun endless runner!
★ Customize your character with a lot of cool customizations!
★ Collect power-ups and coins on your way to the highest score!
★ Buy customizations for coins!
★ Complete quests to earn coins!

AZRK © 2021
